TopicTitle: Great way to handle your custom flags

Articles.Content:
You can place all your custom flags in your own folder instead of KSP\GameData\Squad\Flags

Just make your own folder and drop your flags in it, like KSP\GameData\Krizzen\Flags\Jool Mission.png

Also, if you download some flags, you could make a separate folder and call it "DownloadedFlags"

The new directory structure and loading system rocks! Keeps everything neat and tidy!

Thanks, I'm downloading KSP .20 right now and this will be helpful for my collection of over 300 little pixel flags.

On an unrelated note, does anyone know how to do a mass resize of images that are, for arguments sake, 17x9 pixel flags? For this example, lets just say there's about 300 of them.
